description:
Put kilometres behind you in boots made for long hikes and treks. Building on the successful Rush Mid hiking boot, the Rush Trek increases support and protection for greater stability when carrying a heavier pack. With the feel of a running shoe and the burliness of a hiking boot, they're ready for whatever the trail has in store.

  • Uppers are durable suede panels with lightweight nylon fabric cuffs
  • GORE-TEX® Extended Comfort membrane for waterproofness and breathability
  • DST frame stabilizes feet and provides torsional rigidity
  • Dual-density compression-molded EVA midsole cushions and comforts underfoot
  • Presa® outsole with SuperGum rubber and IKS technology absorbs shocks and grips to slippery and loose surfaces
name: Scarpa Rush Trek Gore-Tex Hiking Boots - Men's
